import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import "./Card.scss" const Card = (props) => { const [arr, setArr] = useState([]) const scrollContainerRef = useRef(null); const [ scroll0, setScroll0] = useState(true) function down(val) { const section = scrollContainerRef.current; const scrollValue = event.target.scrollTop; const scrollStep = 10; // Шаг прокрутки в пикселях if (scrollValue >= 0 && scrollValue < section.scrollHeight - section.clientHeight) { let scrollPosition = section.scrollTop; const scrollInterval = setInterval(() => { scrollPosition += scrollStep; section.scrollTo(0, scrollPosition); if (scrollPosition >= section.scrollHeight - section.clientHeight) { clearInterval(scrollInterval); } }, 15); } else if (scrollValue === 0) { let scrollPosition = section.scrollTop; const scrollInterval = setInterval(() => { scrollPosition -= scrollStep; section.scrollTo(0, scrollPosition); if (scrollPosition <= 0) { clearInterval(scrollInterval); } }, 15); } } return (
